name: Mango Iced Tea With Lemon, Lime And Honey Ice Cubes
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, lemon, lime, mango tea

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the lime juice, lemon juice, honey and water. Pour into an ice cube tray and freeze overnight. Place a few of the ice cubes in each glass and pour the tea over them. Let stand a few minutes until the cubes begin to melt. Stir and serve.
